title: Min hruai tin
lyrics:
Nun tuihal leh beidawng chau in,
Thlalerah chawlhna ka zawng thin a;
Tuihal rehna ka hmu si lo,
A tawpah Lalpa hnenah ka kir leh thin.

Nun tuihal leh beidawng chau in,
Thlalerah chawlhna ka zawng thin a;
Tuihal rehna ka hmu si lo,
A tawpah Lalpa hnenah ka kir leh thin.


Min hruai thin tiau dup hmunah te,
Lalpa chu ka kawng hruaitu a ni;
Meialh leh chhumding in min hruai thin,
Harsatna karah lawmna min pe thin.

Thlipui hlauhawm, hling leh suar te,
Hrehawmna tawh chang te awm mahse;

Chung lam thlir la, hlau suh ang che,
Chutah Lalpa hmel mawi
chu a lo hnai thin.


Min hruai thin tiaudup hmunah te,
Lalpa chu ka kawng hruaitu a ni;
Meialh leh chhumding in min hruai thin,
Harsatna karah lawmna min pe thin.

Tawrhna a ni, ringtu nun hi,
I kawngah chauh chang te awm mahse;

Aw, nghak hram la, thim a kiang thin,
I lungngaih a hnen
thlen la a lo hnai ang.


Min hruai thin tiaudup hmunah te,
Lalpa chu ka kawng hruaitu a ni;
Meialh leh chhumding in min hruai thin,
Harsatna karah lawmna min pe thin.

Meialh leh chhumding in min hruai thin,
Harsatna karah lawmna min pe thin.
